.sprite {
    background-image: url(data:image/png;base64,);
    background-repeat: no-repeat;
    display: block;
}

.sprite-1-enter-icon {
    width: 18px;
    height: 16px;
    background-position: -10px -10px;
}

.sprite-2-vk-icon {
    width: 25px;
    height: 16px;
    background-position: -10px -46px;
}

.sprite-2-vk-icon_hover {
    width: 25px;
    height: 16px;
    background-position: -10px -82px;
}

.sprite-3-fb-icon {
    width: 12px;
    height: 22px;
    background-position: -10px -118px;
}

.sprite-3-fb-icon_hover {
    width: 12px;
    height: 22px;
    background-position: -10px -160px;
}

.sprite-4-inst-icon {
    width: 20px;
    height: 21px;
    background-position: -10px -202px;
}

.sprite-4-inst-icon_hover {
    width: 20px;
    height: 21px;
    background-position: -10px -243px;
}

.sprite-5-user-icon {
    width: 15px;
    height: 15px;
    background-position: -10px -284px;
}

.sprite-6-lock-icon {
    width: 15px;
    height: 17px;
    background-position: -10px -319px;
}
